data.persona: I am a deer. I live in a beautiful forest and am usually left alone. Sometimes the king and his friends try and hunt me with big packs of dogs. I don't like being chased.
data.description:
You are in the the clearing.
the clearing is surrounded by old pine trees where knights used to practice swinging their swords. There are haystacks where they take wenches and pay them a sickle.
There's a sickle, some swords, some trees, some old pine trees, a clearing, some haystacks, and a river here.

You are carrying a mysterious book.

data.short_motivation: I need to wipe the dirt off my book.
data.mid_motivation: I have to convince the priest to help me.
data.long_motivation: I have to save the forest from the evil wizard.
